dcterms:creator: E. Sabir
W. AbdAlmageed
Y. Wu
P. Natarajan
dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset comprising images, text and location modalities. Manipulations are present in text and location modalities and comprise three types of entity manipulations â€” person, location and organization. The dataset comprises 82,156 packages in reference dataset and 57,940 packages split between training, test and validation sets.
dcterms:title: Multimodal Entity Image Repurposing (MEIR)

dcterms:creator: H. Noh
A. Araujo
J. Sim
T. Weyand
B. Han
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image retrieval, containing over 1.2 million images and 14,951 different landmarks. The dataset is used for evaluating location manipulation.
dcterms:title: Google Landmarks

dcterms:description: A dataset created from the Painters by Numbers dataset, restructured for semantic forensics, where the identity of the artist for a given painting is potentially manipulated.
dcterms:title: Painter by Numbers
